author: USA TODAY, Chris Quintana, USA TODAY
title: Trump administration to bar DACA and undocumented students from billions in federal aid
description: The White House on Tuesday blocked tens of thousands of undocumented immigrants and DACA recipients from getting billions of dollars in aid earmarked for college students affected by COVID-19.
content:
The White House on Tuesday blocked tens of thousands of undocumented immigrants and DACA recipients from getting billions of dollars in aid earmarked for college students affected by COVID-19.
